title: Chloe Valdary 3: Encountering the Unknown Voluntarily
description: If you want to hear a longer conversation with Chloe, click here where she tells her life story, what led her to the Theory of Enchantment, and listen in as we play around with some Jordan Peterson quotes. https://youtu.be/ph8fi1iytwQ
